/* req4700DAO.insertReq4700ReqChangeLogInfo - 요구사항 변경 내용 등록(새로운 REQ_CHG_ID 따기)*/ SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_REQ_CHG_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_REQ_CHG_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_REQ_CHG_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(REQ_CHG_ID) AS NEW_REQ_CHG_ID FROM REQ4700 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# AND A.REQ_CHG_ID LIKE 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
/* req4700DAO.insertReq4700ReqChangeLogInfo - 요구사항 변경 내용 등록 */ INSERT INTO REQ4700 A ( A.PRJ_ID, A.REQ_ID, A.REQ_CHG_ID, A.REQ_CHG_TYPE ,A.CHG_USR_ID, A.CHG_DTM, A.PROCESS_ID, A.PRE_FLOW_ID ,A.CHG_FLOW_ID, A.PRE_CHARGER_ID, A.CHG_CHARGER_ID ,A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM, A.MODIFY_USR_ID, A.MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId#, #reqId#, #newReqChgId#, #reqChgType# ,#chgUsrId#, SYSDATE, #processId#, #preFlowId# ,#chgFlowId#, #preChargerId#, #chgChargerId# ,SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,SYSDATE, #modifyUsrId#, #modifyUsrIp# )
